articles.description: The art of design when it comes to wearables is the degree of compactness while keeping all of the functionality intact. The AirPods feature a pretty nifty design, especially the 'Pro' variant that has significantly reduced the stem of the buds. While one of …

articles.author: Thurrottfeed/
articles.title: It's the End of the Road for Google Play Music - Thurrott.com - Thurrott.com
articles.description: This month, Google will finally take the final step in replacing Play Music with YouTube Music: It is deleting all user data in its former music service.
articles.content:
